attributes.action: Recognise covid vaccines administered within Europe.
attributes.additional_details: I am British. I live in France. I haven't seen my parents for a year. My children haven't seen their grandparents for over a year.  I don't want to holiday. I simply want to see my family. It is not financially possible (I have four children). The current regulations are unjust.
attributes.background: As of 19th July, people returning to Britain from Amber listed countries who have had an NHS administered vaccine will no longer need to quarantine for 10 days, nor carry out as many tests.  We want the same rules to apply to people who have had their vaccines in Europe.
